author: rhuijben
msg: In general the revisions stored in the NODES table are more reliable than
those stored in tree conflicts (as the NODES table might change during
resolving). Therefore drop a lot of unnecessary comparisions that raises
assertions when things get out of sync and just trust the nodes information.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc_db_update_move.c
(tc_editor_add_directory,
tc_editor_add_file,
tc_editor_alter_directory,
tc_editor_alter_file,
tc_editor_delete,
update_moved_away_node): Remove revision handling that was just used
to verify if the editor driver was a generic driver.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_wc/op-depth-test.c
(move4_update_delself_AAA): Tweak test to continue until the next problem.
(test_funcs): Remove XFail marker from move4_update_delete_AAA. This XFail
was caused by out of date tree conflict information.
